title: My Pixel 2XL (2018) has constantly shuts down in different scenarios
content:
It all started from my day to day chargers stopped charging. 
Then I've noticed the phone shuts down when I plugged the charger and even when I plugged the USB-C - mini-jack adapter. The car charging adaptor. So randomly... 

What have I already done. 
1. Factory reset.
2. Cleaned the USB-C port with master-man;
3. Changed the wire

It still shuts down often.... 

Do not wanna buy a new phone. This one is 2 years only...
